name: outro
commands: Guys, look.|That pillar's got all sorts of strange symbols on it.
It's got a strange tome sitting on it.|Do you think this is the cause of the events here?
Hmm...interesting|Very interesting.|By the looks of it, it seems that this pillar and tome here was the catalyst for the events that happened here.
Hold on, what just happened and what do you mean by catalyst?
The seals on this tome are quite odd....|The recent battle must've disturbed them.|Luckily, it only seemed to blow up those monsters.
Orginally, this tome belonged to the last set of legendary weapons.
This is the Lifthrasir? The missing piece of the founders' set?

Yes. However this tome is a double-edged sword.|It feeds off the intents of others.|And it can amplify those feelings in the user thereby creating chaos.|Take a look of the bodies, or at least what's left of them.
They've got sword marks. And they look man-made.
So what you're saying is that there used to infighting here.|But what is this pillar doing here?
Surely the lord does not have such strange....tastes in decor.
What is it? Perhaps it could be related.
Well as you know a week ago...|Lilith had come by our town to meet with our Lord.|The last I visited, that pillar had not been there.
I have come with a deal.
May I ask who you are?
I am the Acolyte Lilith and I'm here to create a deal with you.
Acolyte Lilith you say? Your name preceds you, I have heard things about you.
Surely you jest. I am here today to make a deal.|One that you surely would not refuse.
I'm afraid I would have to reject your offer.|I'm afraid being seen with a necromancer reflects poorly of someone of my status.|I mean no offense to you of course.
Please hear me out m'Lord.|As you know, this tome holds tremendous power as it was used during the wars.|i can activate it.
This pillar contraption I brought is able to-
Acolyte Lilith...|I thought she would have been after this Tome...not whatever this is
And how did she know we were going to come here?
Perhaps she knew what Aesc was...after all Teach's last words...
Probably, but...what happened with the Lord?
There had been discontent lately due to disagreements between the City Council.|With the reveal of the revitalized Lifthrasir, it caused panic within the Lord's dissenters.

Yes...conflict had started.|Lifthrasir had absorbed that malice and the pillar amplified those feelings creating a vicious cycle and well...|Perhaps by the time they realized it, it was already too late.
Perhaps they tried to contain it however...they didn't have a light user.|Hm.......

Yes, you.|You can use light magic so you're resistant to its malice.|It will complete the set providing a power boost.|Want it? If not, I'll safeguard it to prevent further incidents.|Take some time to think about it while I examine this situation further.
Hey...I don't fully understand this magic but...|All this talk about corruption and disaster...|This sounds like a terrible thing to bring with us.
I agree with Senya.|It's caused this whole place to ruins.|Who knows what that Lilith was planning? If she knew we were coming here...|Who's to say we're walking right into her trap?
Even so, I'm immune to its effects. We'll need all the power we can get.
I don't think it's worth the risk.|Your safety should come first.|And from what I understand, this Lifthrasir is not the same Lifthrasir.|The pillar had done something to it.
And its not immunity. It's resistance. We don't know anything else about this tome.|It might be powerful, but I think it's more trouble than its worth.
Senya and Schuri didn't like that you took the tome -1 both
I think it's worth the risk. We can use the power to defeat that necromancer.|They were stronger than Teach, so any power would be welcome.
MC...|Alright I can't say I'm happy about your decision, but...|I'll trust you.
Don't make us worry, got it?
Senya and Schuri liked that you didn't take the tome +1 both
This tome will be in a better place with you, Sir.|We prefer not to take the risk.
Alright, that take cares of that then.
Oh thank the Spirits.|For a split second I thought that creepy book would have to come with us.
That's a relief! There's no need for such a risk.
Hey! Best not to linger here.|Who knows what else might be hiding here.
